name: FreeCycle Dark + Extended + No AdBlocker message
description: Dark Metro black theme for Freecycle.org + extended borders and shadows on header and nav menu using the pages existing styles for a more fluid like. This is the no adblcoker message version
additional_info:
V1 Release Notes: Initial release. I plan on extending these styles to store.freecycle and groups.freecycle - no adblocker message version
V2 Release Notes: Lots of clean up, removed list-styles from all lists.
